T11dhkhetuu:3: Pramanasiddhi-chapter v.232; NB03015=NB, the Pararthanumana-chapter sutra

T11dhkhetuu:5: 3. In this database, sentences are artificially divided into word-units,
T11dhkhetuu:6: although they involve a phonetic fusion or union in the basic texts. Further, compound words
T11dhkhetuu:7: divided into their shortest constitutive elements (we use a hyphen to indicate that
T11dhkhetuu:8: hyphenated elements originally form a compound word) with the following
T11dhkhetuu:10: 3.1. The prefixes a-, dur-, nih- remain undivided, irrespective of attachment to words or compound words.
T11dhkhetuu:11: 3.2. Suffixes making an adverb, for example -vat, -vasa, are divided. But suffixes making a possessive adjective, for example -vat, -mat, remain undivided,
T11dhkhetuu:12: and terms such as a numeral+ -dha/-vidha/-prakara remain also undivided.
T11dhkhetuu:13: 3.3. Compound words with the suffixes -ta/-tva or -bhava/-bhuta
T11dhkhetuu:14: fundamentally remain undivided. For example: karyakaranabhava/-bhuta/-ta.
T11dhkhetuu:15: 3.4. Compound words with evam-, tat-, tatha-, para-, yatha-, su-, sva- in the wordhead fundamentally remain undivided. For example: evamjatiya,
T11dhkhetuu:17: tathakrta, paratantra, yathartha, yathasvam, sujnanatva, svabhava.
T11dhkhetuu:18: 3.5. Some compound words which are regarded as terminology remain also
T11dhkhetuu:19: undivided. For example: agnihotra, ayogavyavaccheda, arthapatti, padartha,
T11dhkhetuu:22: 4. Those terms whose wordhead is subject to the Sandhi rules (for example,
T11dhkhetuu:24: dhetu-) are cited in their original form (for example, -d *hetu-) for the sake of using this database to make an KWIC index.

T11dhkhetuu:243: 01208 tatra yo avyavadhāna-ādi-deśo rūpa-indriya-ādi-kalāpaḥ sa vijñāna-
T11dhkhetuu:244: 01209 janane samartho hetuḥ. yas teṣāṃ paraspara-upasarpaṇa-
T11dhkhetuu:246: 01211 teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ na paścān na pṛthag bhāva iti samarthān 01212 api pūrva-apara-pṛthag-bhāva-bhāvino doṣā na upalīyante. tena yas 01213 teṣāṃ paraspara-upasarpaṇa-ādi-hetuḥ sa samarthasya hetur iti tatra 01214 na kadācid anyathābhāvaḥ. anena nyāyena sarvatra hetu-phala-
T11dhkhetuu:248: 01216 bheda-anvayinīṣu bhāva-śaktiṣu, na tu sthira-eka-svabhāveṣu bhāveṣu,
T11dhkhetuu:251: 01219 anya-sahitaḥ karoti na kevala iti cet, kiṃ kevalasya kārya-
T11dhkhetuu:252: 01220 janane samarthaḥ svabhāvo asamartho vā samartha iti cet, kiṃ
T11dhkhetuu:253: 01221 na karoti, akurvan kathaṃ samarthaḥ. kuvinda-ādayaḥ paṭa-ādi-
T11dhkhetuu:254: 01222 kriyāyāṃ samarthā api na sarvadā kurvanti iti cet, krīḍana-śīlo
T11dhkhetuu:256: 01301 mūrkhaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ kṛtam api punaḥ punaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:257: 01302 kārayati, tathā hy etad bīja-ādy-upanyāse nirloṭhitam. tasmāt
T11dhkhetuu:263: 01307 so akāraka eva, sāmarthya-ākhyād bhāvāt kārya-utpatteḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:264: 01308 api ca sa eva tāvat sakala-sahakāri-sahitaḥ kāryaṃ kasmāt 01309 karoti kurvan dṛṣṭaḥ, tena karoti iti brūmaḥ. aho mahā-sāmarthyaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:265: 01310 mahā-prabhāvasya darśanam atat-svabhāvān api bhāvān 01311 svabhāva-mātreṇa nānā-vyāpāreṣu niyuñjanam. yadi nāma 01312 kadācit kiṃcit kathaṃcit atra-bhavanto darśana-patham atikrāmet,
T11dhkhetuu:267: 01314 cintā cittaṃ dunoti. na vai vayam atat-svabhāvānām asmad-darśana-
T11dhkhetuu:268: 01315 vaśāt kārya-kriyāṃ brūmaḥ. kiṃ tarhi. svabhāvena eva te
T11dhkhetuu:269: 01316 tat-karaṇa-dharmāḥ, tān paśyantaḥ kevalaṃ jānīmahe ta ete
T11dhkhetuu:270: 01317 kārakā iti. satyam, idam apy asti, svabhāvas teṣāṃ kārya-kriyā-
T11dhkhetuu:271: 01318 dharmā, tena samasta-pratyayavatām akṛtvā na upekṣā āpattir iti.
T11dhkhetuu:272: 01319 so akṣepa-kriyā-dharmā svabhāvaḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ tadā eva antya-
T11dhkhetuu:273: 01320 avasthāyām utpanna āhosvit prāg apy āsīt. āsīt, apracyuta-utpanna-
T11dhkhetuu:275: 01401 virodhāt. tat kim idānīṃ mātā ca vandhyā ca; ko vā asya
T11dhkhetuu:276: 01402 bhāṣitasya artho akṣepa-kriyā-dharmā ca svabhāvo na ca karoti iti.
T11dhkhetuu:277: 01403 sahitas tat-svabhāvo na kevala iti cet, anyas tarhi kevalo
T11dhkhetuu:278: 01404 anyaś ca sahitas, svabhāva-bhedo hi bhāva-bhedasya lakṣaṇam.
T11dhkhetuu:279: 01405 na hi sa sāhitye api pararūpeṇa kartā; svarūpaṃ ca asya prāg
T11dhkhetuu:280: 01406 api tad eva iti kathaṃ kadācit kriyā-virāmaḥ. yasya api bhāvaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:281: 01407 kṣaṇikas tasya api kasmāt kevalo na karoti, yadi bhavet, kuryād eva.
T11dhkhetuu:282: 01408 kathaṃ na bhavati. kṣaṇikatvāt. uktaṃ yādṛśasya kriyā. sa katham 01409 eka-kṣaṇa-bhāvy anyathā bhavet. yaś ca bhavati, sa eva na
T11dhkhetuu:283: 01410 bhavati iti na ayaṃ prasaṅgaḥ, kāraka-akārakayoḥ svabhāva-tad-
T11dhkhetuu:285: 01412 yo api manyate akṣepa-kriyā-dharmā eva sa tasya svabhāvaḥ,
T11dhkhetuu:286: 01413 na sa sāhityam apekṣate, kāryaṃ tu pratyaya-antara-apekṣam
T11dhkhetuu:287: 01414 iti sahitebhya eva jāyate na kevalebhya iti, tasya api 01415 kathaṃ sa kevalo api karoty eva kāryaṃ ca tasmān na utpadyate 01416 iti tad-avastho virodhaḥ. na kevalaḥ karoty eva iti cet, katham
T11dhkhetuu:288: 01417 idānīm akṣepa-kriyā-svabhāvaḥ. nanv etad eva paridīpitaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:289: 01418 bhavati karoty eva iti; kāryaṃ ca ayaṃ kevalo api samarthaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:290: 01419 san param apekṣamānaṃ katham upekṣeta. param anādṛtya etad
T11dhkhetuu:291: 01420 prasahya kuryāt, evaṃ hy anena ātmanaḥ sāmarthyaṃ darśitaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:292: 01421 bhavati. kāryaṃ param apekṣata iti tataḥ kevalād anutpattir
T11dhkhetuu:293: 01501 uktā bhavati, sa kevalo api samartha-svabhāva iti tata utpattiṃ
T11dhkhetuu:294: 01502 brūṣe, ete ca ekatra kathaṃ syātām. tad ayam īrśyā-śalya-vitudyamāna-
T11dhkhetuu:295: 01503 marmā viklavaṃ vikrośati ity upekṣām arhati.
T11dhkhetuu:296: 01504 tasmād idam eka-arthakriyā-lakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ kṣaṇikānāṃ 01505 eva bhāvānām, na tv akṣaṇikānāṃ pṛthagbhāva-sambhavānām,
T11dhkhetuu:298: 01507 yatra tu santāna-upakāreṇa bhāvā hetutāṃ pratipadyante
T11dhkhetuu:301: 01510 sahakriyā ucyate, na dravya-āśrayeṇa, kṣaṇike dravye viśeṣa-
T11dhkhetuu:302: 01511 anutpatteḥ; na hi taṇḍula-ādīnāṃ dahana-ādau krameṇa svabhāva-
T11dhkhetuu:307: 01515 akṣepa-kāriṣu tv indriya-ādiṣu na viśeṣa-utpattiḥ parasparataḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:309: 01517 yogya-deśa-ādy-avasthā jātāḥ, te saha svabhāva-niṣpattyā jñāna-
T11dhkhetuu:310: 01518 hetutāṃ pratipadyanta iti tatra eka-arthakriyā eva sahakāritvam.
T11dhkhetuu:311: 01519 yatra viśeṣa-utpādanena sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayās tatra hetu-
T11dhkhetuu:312: 01520 santānaḥ pratyayān apekṣata iti tataḥ svabhāva-antara-pratilambha-
T11dhkhetuu:314: 01522 tebhya eva viśiṣṭa-kṣaṇa-utpādāt krameṇa yāvad atiśayavato
T11dhkhetuu:317: 01602 eva utpattir na yuktā. aviśiṣṭād viśeṣa-utpattau kāryasya api 01603 syāt; paraspara-viśeṣa-utpādān apekṣiṇo api sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:318: 01604 kurvīran. tena akṣaṇikānām api sahakāry-anapekṣāṇāṃ kāraṇatā
T11dhkhetuu:319: 01605 syāt, apekṣaṇīyebhyaḥ svabhāva-atiśaya-utpattiś ca na syāt. atha
T11dhkhetuu:320: 01606 sahakāriṇā kṛta-viśeṣa eva viśeṣa-utpādāv apy upatiṣṭheta; evam
T11dhkhetuu:321: 01607 anavasthā syāt. na ca sahakāriṇaḥ paraspara-kārya-utpāda-anuguṇa
T11dhkhetuu:322: 01608 viśeṣa-utpādane nityaṃ yogya-avasthā yena eṣāṃ paraspara-
T11dhkhetuu:324: 01610 viraha-darśanāt. tena ādyo viśeṣaḥ sahakāribhyo nirupakārasya 01611 na utpadyata iti cet, na asmākaṃ punaḥ punar vacane kaścid
T11dhkhetuu:325: 01612 udvego bhavati; yady evam api lokasya nyāya-pratītir bhavati,
T11dhkhetuu:326: 01613 hanta tarhy ucyatām. na viśeṣa-utpādanād eva sahakāriṇāṃ 01614 sahakāritvāṃ yatas tad-abhāvād viśeṣa-janane sahakāriṇo na 01615 syuḥ. kiṃ tarhi. eka-arthakriyāyā api. sa api bhavet parasparato
T11dhkhetuu:327: 01616 viśeṣa-rahitānām. atha bhavet, pṛthag api bhavet; tathā ca tad
T11dhkhetuu:328: 01617 viśeṣa-bhāvi kāryam api kevalād bhavet iti cet, pratikṣaṇam
T11dhkhetuu:329: 01618 aparāparaiḥ pratyayair yathā bhāva-santāne viśeṣa-utpattir yogya-
T11dhkhetuu:330: 01619 deśatā-ādy-avasthā-viśeṣāṇāṃ ca kārya-karaṇaṃ teṣāṃ ca yata
T11dhkhetuu:331: 01620 utpattiḥ pratyekaṃ ca sāmarthye api yathā kevalānām akriyā-
T11dhkhetuu:335: 01704 bhedād iti sarvam uktam. tatra sahakāribhyaḥ santāna-upakāra-
T11dhkhetuu:337: 01706 kṛta-viśeṣa-janmā na bhavati anantara-kārya-vat, tat-prabhṛti ye
T11dhkhetuu:338: 01707 viśeṣās te taj-janmānaḥ, tasya teṣāṃ ca tat-prakṛtitvād iti
T11dhkhetuu:339: 01708 na anavasthā. tathā yady akṣaṇiko api bhāva ādya-viśeṣa-kāraṇa-vad
T11dhkhetuu:340: 01709 ajanita-atiśayaḥ kāryaṃ kuryāt, karotu nāma; so asya svabhāvo
T11dhkhetuu:342: 01711 api tathā syād ity uktam atat-svabhāvas tu tadā apy akāraka eva.
T11dhkhetuu:343: 01712 tasmād akṣaṇikānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ na eka-arthakriyayā kaścit
T11dhkhetuu:344: 01713 sahakāritva-niyamo na api santāna-upakāreṇa iti na tasya kaścit
T11dhkhetuu:346: 01714 tasmāt kevalo api kuryāt. prāyas tu saṃghāta-sthāyī bhāva-
T11dhkhetuu:349: 01717 svabhāva-antarasya utpattir iti vyaktam; kāryasya apekṣā ity
T11dhkhetuu:350: 01718 ucyate. kārakasya svabhāvasya prāg api bhāvo akriyā na yujyate.
T11dhkhetuu:351: 01801 tasmād yo yad-ātmā sa sattā-mātreṇa tādṛśo bhavati;
T11dhkhetuu:352: 01802 na bhūtvā tad-bhāve para-abhisaṃskāram apekṣate. svabhāvato
T11dhkhetuu:353: 01803 asthiti-dharmaṇo bhāvasya na kiṃcin nāśa-kāraṇaiḥ; sthiti-dharmaṇo
T11dhkhetuu:354: 01804 api bhāvasya nāśa-kāraṇaiḥ kim, svabhāvasya kenacid anyathā
T11dhkhetuu:355: 01805 kartum aśakyatvāt. anyathātva-pratipattau vā tat-svabhāva eva
T11dhkhetuu:356: 01806 na syād iti pūrva eva vikalpaḥ, tatra ca uktam. yaś ca parasmād
T11dhkhetuu:357: 01807 anyathābhāvaḥ so aparaḥ svabhāvaḥ yaś ca aparaḥ sa kathaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:358: 01808 tasya, svabhāva-bheda-lakṣaṇatvād bhāva-bhedasya. tathā ca pūrvako
T11dhkhetuu:359: 01809 bhāvo acyuti-dharme sthita iti na tasya anyathābhāvaḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:363: 01812 vināśe agny-āder upādānāc ca apara eva drava-ādi-svabhāva-
T11dhkhetuu:365: 01814 sa svayaṃ sthiti-dharmā eva, vināśa-hetv-asambhave avasthānāt.
T11dhkhetuu:366: 01815 tasya parasmād vināśaḥ, na ca vināśo nāma aparaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
T11dhkhetuu:367: 01816 bhāva-cyutir eva vināśa iti cet, na idam uttaraṃ vikalpa-
T11dhkhetuu:368: 01817 dvayam atikrāmati. kiṃ nityo bhāvaḥ svabhāvena āhosvid anityo iti
T11dhkhetuu:369: 01818 vikalpe prāṅ nityo bhūtvā paścād anityo bhavati iti bruvāṇaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:371: 01820 bhāva-dvayaṃ ca svayaṃ ca nāśam anāśaṃ ca prāha iti 01821 pūrvasmin vināśa-hetur asamarthaḥ. na prāṅ nityo bhūtvā paścād 01822 anityo bhavati. kiṃ tarhi. paścād api nityo eva, eka-svabhāvatvāt.
T11dhkhetuu:372: 01823 sa tarhi bhāvaḥ svabhāvena nāśam anāviśan kathaṃ naṣṭo 01901 nāma, tat-svabhāva-vināśayor
T11dhkhetuu:373: 01902 tasmāt saty asya vināśe vināśa-svabhāvena anena bhavitavyam.
T11dhkhetuu:374: 01903 tathā api vyartho vināśa-hetur ity uktam. tena svabhāvato 01904 naśvare anaśvare vā bhāve na vināśa-hetor upayogaḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:375: 01905 tasmād vināśe anapekṣo bhāvas tad-bhāva-niyata iti yaḥ 01906 san sa vināśī, nāśvaratāyā nivṛttau ca sattva-nivṛttir ity
T11dhkhetuu:377: 01908 svabhāvato naśvaratve api kaścid atat-svabhāvo api syāt, na
T11dhkhetuu:378: 01909 hi sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāva iti na anvaya-vyatireka-siddhir iti cet,
T11dhkhetuu:379: 01910 na, akṣaṇikatve avastutva-prasaṅgāt. śaktir hi bhāva-lakṣaṇam,
T11dhkhetuu:380: 01911 sarva-śakti-viraho abhāva-lakṣaṇam. na ca akṣaṇya kvacit kācic 01912 śaktiḥ, kramayaugapadyābhyām arthakriyā-virahāt. tasmād yat 01913 sat tat kṣaṇikam eva iti vyāpti-siddhiḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:381: 01914 arthāntare gamye kārye kāryaṃ hetuḥ, avyabhicārāt.
T11dhkhetuu:385: 01918 kāryaṃ svabhāvair yāvadbhir avinābhāvi kāraṇe, teṣāṃ
T11dhkhetuu:386: 01919 hetuḥ, tat-kāryatva-niyamāt, tair eva ca dharmair ye tair
T11dhkhetuu:387: 01920 vinā na bhavanti. aṃśena janyajanakatva-prasaṅga iti cet, na,
T11dhkhetuu:391: 02002 kasyacit kadācit kutaścit bhāve api sarvas tādṛśas tathāvidha-
T11dhkhetuu:392: 02003 janmā iti kuto avasitam. tathā ca na anvaya-vyatirekāv iti cet,
T11dhkhetuu:393: 02004 na, atad-bhāvinas tasya sakṛd api tato abhāvāt. paraspara-apekṣayā
T11dhkhetuu:394: 02005 janya-janaka-svabhāva-lakṣaṇe kārya-kāraṇe. tatra yadi 02006 dhūmo agny-ādi-sāmagryā anyato api bhavet, tasya taj-janyaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:395: 02007 svabhāvo na bhavati iti sakṛd api tato na bhaved arthāntara-vat,
T11dhkhetuu:396: 02008 na api sāmagrī taṃ janayet, ataj-janana-svabhāvatvāt sāmagry-antara-
T11dhkhetuu:397: 02009 vat. na ca dhūmasya tad-ataj-janya-svabhāvo yuktaḥ,
T11dhkhetuu:400: 02012 akāraṇa-apekṣaṇe ca ahetutva-prasaṅgāt. tasmād yo 02013 dhūma-jananaḥ, so agny-ādi-sāmagrī-viśeṣaḥ yo agny-ādy-sāmagrī-
T11dhkhetuu:401: 02014 viśeṣa-janitaḥ so dhūma iti kārya-kāraṇayor evaṃ svabhāva-niyamāt
T11dhkhetuu:402: 02015 tad vijātīyād utpattir na bhavati. tat kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:403: 02016 na vyabhicarati. tena siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve kāryasya
T11dhkhetuu:405: 02018 nanu vijātīyād api kiṃcid bhavad dṛṣṭam, tad yathā 02019 gomaya-ādeḥ śālūka-ādiḥ. na vijātīyād utpattiḥ. tathāvidham
T11dhkhetuu:406: 02020 eva hi tādṛśām ādi-nimittam iti na kāraṇa-bhedaḥ. prabandhena
T11dhkhetuu:407: 02101 vṛttau tu śarād bhavati. asti ca gomaya-itara-janman-svabhāva-
T11dhkhetuu:408: 02102 bhedo rūpasya abhede api, na hy ākāra-tulyatā eva bhāvānāṃ 02103 tattve nimittam, abhinna-ākārāṇām api keṣāṃcid anyato viśeṣāj
T11dhkhetuu:409: 02104 jāti-bheda-darśanāt. anyathā hi vilakṣaṇāyā api sāmagryā 02105 avilakṣaṇa-kārya-utpattau ca kāraṇa-bheda-abhedābhyāṃ kārya-bheda-
T11dhkhetuu:410: 02106 abhedāv ity ahetukau viśvasya bheda-abhedau syātām. tathā
T11dhkhetuu:411: 02107 hi na bhedād bheda ity abhedād api na abhedaḥ, tad-vyatiriktaś
T11dhkhetuu:412: 02108 ca na kaścid bhāva-svabhāva ity ahetukatvād bhāvānāṃ nityaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:413: 02109 sattvam asattvaṃ vā syāt, apekṣyasya abhāvāt. apekṣayā hi 02110 bhāvāḥ kādācitkā bhavanti vyavasthāvāṃś ca sādhyeṣu
T11dhkhetuu:414: 02111 sādhana-niyogo na syāt. kāraṇa-śakti-pratiniyame hi kiṃcid eva
T11dhkhetuu:415: 02112 kasyacit sādhanāya upādīyeta, na aparam, tasya eva tatra śakter
T11dhkhetuu:416: 02113 anyasya ca aśakteḥ, tayos taj-janana-itara-svabhāvatvena bhedāt.
T11dhkhetuu:417: 02114 taj-janana-svabhāva-vilakṣaṇād api tasya utpattau na taj-janana-
T11dhkhetuu:419: 02116 śakti-sāmye tu tad eva iti na kāryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyabhicarati.
T11dhkhetuu:428: 02202 yogyatā eva anupalabdhiḥ pūrvavat. yatra yasminn upalabhyamāne
T11dhkhetuu:429: 02203 niyamena yasya upalabdhir bhavati yogyatāyā aviśeṣāt,
T11dhkhetuu:430: 02204 sa tat-saṃsṛṣṭaḥ, eka-jñāna-saṃsargāt. tayoḥ sator na eka-rūpa-
T11dhkhetuu:432: 02206 eka-jñāna-saṃsargiṇoḥ paraspara-apekṣam eva anyatvam iha abhipretam,
T11dhkhetuu:434: 02208 tad-anya iti taj-jñānaṃ tat-svabhāvo vā jñātṛ-jñeya-dharma-
T11dhkhetuu:438: 02212 abhāva-vyavahāraṃ sādhayed iti cet, uktam atra yathā paryudāsa-
T11dhkhetuu:439: 02213 vṛttyā apekṣāto abhāvo anupalabdhiś ca anupalabdhiḥ. na pratiṣedha-
T11dhkhetuu:441: 02215 prasaṅgāt. tasya asaṃsṛṣṭa-rūpasya bhāva-siddhir eva aparasya abhāva-
T11dhkhetuu:442: 02216 siddhir ity anyabhāvo api tad-abhāva iti vyapadeśyate.
T11dhkhetuu:444: 02218 vyavahāraṃ sādhayet tat-siddhi-siddho vā tad-abhāva iti
T11dhkhetuu:445: 02219 na kaścid viśeṣaḥ, yena anupalabdhyā abhāva-vyavahāra-siddher
T11dhkhetuu:447: 02301 syāt. sa eva anyabhāvas tad-viṣayā ca upalabdhis tad-abhāvasya
T11dhkhetuu:448: 02302 kiṃ na sādhanam, kiṃ punar anyabhāvasya siddhir eva 02303 tad-abhāva-siddhir iti cet, apṛthak-siddhiḥ sambandha-abhāvāc ca.
T11dhkhetuu:450: 02305 yat-siddhau yasya na siddhiḥ, tat tasya liṅgaṃ bhavati, dhūma-
T11dhkhetuu:451: 02306 agni-vat. anyabhāva-siddhyā eva tad-abhāvaḥ prasidhyati, tasya
T11dhkhetuu:454: 02309 sambandha-abhāvāc ca. tac ca tasya liṅgaṃ yadi syāt, tasya
T11dhkhetuu:455: 02310 tena kaścit sambandho bhavet, yathā kṛtakatva-anityatvayor
T11dhkhetuu:457: 02311 samavāyo dhūmasya liṅginaś ca eka-artha-samavāyo vā ādhārādheyabhāvo 02312 vā janyajanakabhāvo vā. na evaṃ kaścid bhāva-abhāvayoḥ
T11dhkhetuu:459: 02314 asti viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ śabda-artha-sambandha-vad iti cet, śabda-
T11dhkhetuu:460: 02315 arthayos tat-pratipādana-abhiprāye sati tat-prayogāt tena saha 02316 kārya-kāraṇa-lakṣaṇo avinābhāva-lakṣaṇo vā sambandhaḥ syāt.
T11dhkhetuu:461: 02317 ayaṃ ca atra na sambhavati iti kathaṃ viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ syāt.
T11dhkhetuu:462: 02318 siddhe hi tayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāve tan-mukhena viṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:463: 02319 syāt; sa eva asati sambandhe na sidhyati; tad-asiddhau
T11dhkhetuu:464: 02320 viṣayaviṣayibhāvo api na. anyathā itaretara-āśrayam idaṃ syāt.
T11dhkhetuu:465: 02321 anyabhāvāc ca abhāva-siddhāv asamudāyaś ca sādhyaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:466: 02322 syāt. tathā ca ghaṭa-abhāvas tad-anyabhāvād iti ghaṭasya sarvatra
T11dhkhetuu:467: 02323 sarvadā ca abhāvaḥ syāt. na, pradeśa-ādi-dharmy-abhāva-sādhanād iti
T11dhkhetuu:468: 02401 cet; pradeśa-ādi-dharmi-viśeṣaṇa-bhūto abhāvaḥ sādhyate, na tu 02402 kevalaḥ; tato na asamudāyasya sādhyatā. na ca liṅga-liṅginor
T11dhkhetuu:469: 02403 asambandho anyabhāvasya pradeśa-ādinā dharmiṇā sambandhād 02404 iti manyate. na, pradeśa-āder eva anyabhāvatvāt. yatra eva hi
T11dhkhetuu:470: 02405 pradeśe yan na asti ity ucyate sa eva tena asaṃsṛṣṭo anyabhāvaḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:471: 02406 tad-darśanād eva asya ghaṭo na asti iti vikalpa iti kathaṃ tasya eva 02407 liṅgaliṅgibhāvaḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:472: 02408 na ca atra sāmānya-viśeṣa-bhāva-kalpanā sambhavati, yena
T11dhkhetuu:473: 02409 sāmānyaṃ hetur bhavet viśeṣo dharmī iti, tad-viśeṣa-pratipatter eva
T11dhkhetuu:474: 02410 tad-abhāvasya pratītes tasya ca anyatra anya-abhāvāt.
T11dhkhetuu:476: 02411 ca na hetutvam. na ca yatra pradeśa-mātraṃ
T11dhkhetuu:477: 02412 tatra ghaṭa-abhāvaḥ. tādṛśe kevale pradeśe abhāva eva iti cet,
T11dhkhetuu:478: 02413 nanu tasya eva kevala iti ghaṭa-viraha iti. sa ca liṅgabhūta-
T11dhkhetuu:479: 02414 pradeśa-pratipattāv eva siddhaḥ. kasya idānīṃ tal liṅgam. anvayasya
T11dhkhetuu:480: 02415 anugamanaṃ ca nirarthakam. tasmād anyabhāvo na sādhanam
T11dhkhetuu:482: 02417 asti virodhaḥ sambandhaḥ, tato anyabhāvād abhāvasya
T11dhkhetuu:483: 02418 siddhir iti cet, kena kasya virodhaḥ. anyabhāvena pratiyoginaḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:484: 02419 kiṃ nu vai pratiyogī pramātum iṣṭo, yena liṅga-liṅginor virodhaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:485: 02420 sambandhaḥ syāt. abhāvas tu pratiyogino ghaṭasya anyabhāvena aviruddhaḥ,
T11dhkhetuu:487: 02422 virodhaḥ. tasmāt sambandha-abhāvaḥ. atra apy asamudāya-sādhyatvaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:490: 02425 gatyā api tad-abhāva-gatir na syād iti cet, na vai kutaścit
T11dhkhetuu:492: 02501 anyabhāvas tad-abhāva-gamaka iṣṭaḥ, kiṃ tv anyabhāva-
T11dhkhetuu:493: 02502 eva tad-abhāvaḥ, yathoktaṃ prāk. tasya anya-asaṃsṛṣṭa-rūpasya
T11dhkhetuu:497: 02504 tasya kaivalyam aparasya vaikalyam iti tad-anyabhāva
T11dhkhetuu:498: 02505 eva tad-abhāvaḥ, tad-anya-pratipattir eva ca tad-apratipattir
T11dhkhetuu:499: 02506 iti. anyathā tasya paricchedena tato anyasya avyavacchede
T11dhkhetuu:500: 02507 tat-pariccheda eva na syāt, tad-atadrūpayor avivekāt. ya eṣa 02508 vyavahāraḥ kasyacid darśanāt kvacit prāpti-parihāra-arthaḥ, sa
T11dhkhetuu:501: 02509 na syāt. na hy ayam analaṃ paśyann api kevalam analam 02510 eva paśyati, yena salila-arthī na pravarteta.
T11dhkhetuu:502: 02511 anupalambhena salila-abhāvaḥ pratīyata iti cet, ko ayam anupalambho
T11dhkhetuu:503: 02512 nāma. yadi salila-upalambha-abhāva iti, kathaṃ so abhāvaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:504: 02513 kasyacit pratipattiḥ pratipatti-hetur vā; tasya api kathaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:505: 02514 pratipattiḥ. tasya tato vā anyasya kasyacid apy apratipattāv
T11dhkhetuu:507: 02516 pṛṣṭhībhava-ādy-avasthāsv apy abhāvaḥ kiṃ na pratīyate. bhūyo api 02517 vicāritaṃ pramāṇaviniścaye. tasmād ayam analaṃ paśyann apy 02518 analo ayaṃ na salilam ity anadhyavasyan na tiṣṭhen na api
T11dhkhetuu:508: 02519 pratiṣṭheta iti dustaraṃ vyasanaṃ pratipannaḥ syāt.
T11dhkhetuu:509: 02520 tata eva ekasya darśanād anya-abhāva-gatir bhavati iti cet,
T11dhkhetuu:510: 02521 katham ekaṃ dṛṣṭam anyan na asti iti pratyāyayati. kevalasya
T11dhkhetuu:511: 02601 darśanād iti cet, idam eva asmābhir abhihitam, kasmāt tava atra
T11dhkhetuu:512: 02602 paruṣam iva ābhāti. tasmāt tīra-adarśinā eva śakuninā paryaṭā
T11dhkhetuu:513: 02603 api pratyāgantavyam ity alam avidyamāna-pratiṣṭhānayā diśaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:515: 02605 yady eka-paricchedād eva anya-vyavacchedaḥ sidhyati, sarvasya
T11dhkhetuu:516: 02606 anyasya aviśeṣeṇa tatra abhāva-siddhir bhavet, na
T11dhkhetuu:519: 02608 iti viśeṣaṇaṃ ca na vaktavyam, anupalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptānām
T11dhkhetuu:522: 02611 tad-anyasya ātmā bhavati. anya-ātmano avyavacchede pravṛtti-
T11dhkhetuu:523: 02612 nivṛttyor abhāva iti pūrvaḥ prasaṅgaḥ. taṃ ca deśa-kāla-svabhāva-
T11dhkhetuu:525: 02614 pracyutim asya vyavacchinatti. evaṃ hi sa tayā paricchinno 02615 yady anyathābhāvo vyavacchinno bhavati tathātvaṃ ca
T11dhkhetuu:526: 02616 tasya eva bhavati na anyasya ity anyathābhūtād vyavacchindaty 02617 eva tat paricchinatti. evam ekasya pramāṇasya vṛttiḥ sarva-
T11dhkhetuu:532: 02623 tasmāt kvacit pramāṇaṃ pravṛttaṃ tat paricchinatti
T11dhkhetuu:534: 02701 sūcayati iti eka-pramāṇa-vyāpāra eṣaḥ. tathā hi kvacit pramāṇaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:536: 02703 tasya eva paricchedāt, tad-anyad eva ca tasmād vyavacchinatti,
T11dhkhetuu:537: 02704 tatra aparicchedāt. atas tad eva pramāṇaṃ prakāra-antara-abhāvaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:538: 02705 sādhayati, tasmin dṛśyamāne adṛṣṭasya tad-anyatvena sarvasya
T11dhkhetuu:539: 02706 vyavasthāpanād atad-anyasya eva ca tattvena vyavasthāpanāt.
T11dhkhetuu:541: 02709 tad evaṃ ekasya upalambhāt tasya tad-anya-ātmano vyavacchedaḥ,
T11dhkhetuu:542: 02710 na tad-deśa-kālayoḥ sarvasya anyasya bhāvasya vyavacchedaḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:543: 02711 tasmād atadātmā ca syāt tad-deśa-kālaś ca, rasa-rūpa-ādi-
T11dhkhetuu:544: 02712 vat. tasmād yathoktād eva anupalambhāt kvacit kadācit
T11dhkhetuu:546: 02714 anyabhāva-viṣaya-upalabdhir api tad-abhāvasya sādhikā iṣṭā eva,
T11dhkhetuu:547: 02715 na tu liṅgatvena, tatra apy abhāvasya pṛthak sādhyatve 02716 sambandha-abhāvasya tulyatvāt. liṅga-āvirbhāva-kāla eva tad-abhāva-
T11dhkhetuu:548: 02717 siddheḥ. na hy anyabhāvaṃ pratipadya tat-pratipatter anvaya-
T11dhkhetuu:549: 02718 vyatirekau prasādhya tad-abhāvaṃ pratipadyate. kiṃ tarhi.
T11dhkhetuu:551: 02720 darśana-anantaraṃ vyavadhānena vinā idam asti idaṃ tu na asti iti
T11dhkhetuu:552: 02721 vyavasthāpanāt, dṛṣṭānta-asiddheḥ. tac ca tasya liṅgaṃ yad 02722 yasya anvayi vyatireki ca. na hy evaṃ śakyaṃ darśayituṃ yatra anya-
T11dhkhetuu:553: 02723 bhāva-upalabdhis tatra tad-abhāva iti, tad-eka-upalabdheḥ kvacid apy 02724 abhāvāt. sāmānyena pradarśane dṛṣṭānte api pramāṇa-antara-abhāvāt
T11dhkhetuu:554: 02725 sā eva tad-anyabhāva-upalabdhiḥ sādhya-dharmasya sādhikā iti 02726 dṛṣṭānta-anavasthitvād
T11dhkhetuu:555: 02801 tasmān na kutaścil liṅgād abhāva-siddhiḥ. so anyabhāvaḥ 02802 pratyakṣa-lakṣaṇena anupalambhena siddho mūḍha-pratipattāv
T11dhkhetuu:557: 02804 sā iyaṃ tridhā anupalabdhiḥ. siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve 02805 bhāvasya kāraṇasya anupalabdhir
T11dhkhetuu:560: 02808 anyabhāva-siddher eva. sa tatra asiddhaḥ kārya-vyāpyayor abhāvam
T11dhkhetuu:561: 02809 abhāva-vyavahāraṃ vā sādhayati. svabhāva-anupalabdhau tv anupalabdhyā 02810 liṅgabhūtayā abhāva-vyavahāra eva sādhyate.
T11dhkhetuu:564: 02813 ca sādhayataḥ sā ca anupalabdhis tayor upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-
T11dhkhetuu:565: 02814 prāptāv eva asad-vyavahārasya sādhikā, kathaṃ tayoḥ parokṣe
T11dhkhetuu:566: 02815 arthe prayogaḥ. na eva prayogaḥ pramāṇatayā, liṅgasya aniścayāt.
T11dhkhetuu:567: 02816 kevalaṃ kāraṇa-vyāpakayoḥ siddha-sambandhayor yady abhāvaḥ 02817 parasya avaśyam abhāva-niścaya iti darśana-artham ete prayujyete.
T11dhkhetuu:568: 02818 ity eṣa pakṣa-dharmo anvaya-vyatirekavān iti tad-aṃśena
T11dhkhetuu:569: 02819 vyāptas tri-lakṣaṇas trirūpa eva hetur gamakaḥ, sva-sādhya-
T11dhkhetuu:571: 02821 ṣaḍ-lakṣaṇo hetur ity apare. trīṇi ca etāny abādhita-viṣayatvam
T11dhkhetuu:573: 02902 tatra abādhita-viṣayatvaṃ tāvat pṛthag lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati,
T11dhkhetuu:574: 02903 bādha-avinābhāvayor virodhāt. avinābhāvo hi saty eva sādhya-
T11dhkhetuu:575: 02904 dharme bhāvo hetoḥ. sa hetus tal-lakṣaṇo dharmiṇi syāt, atra
T11dhkhetuu:576: 02905 ca sādhya-dharmaḥ kathaṃ na bhavet. pratyakṣa-anumāne hi
T11dhkhetuu:578: 02907 tasmin saty eva hetur bhavaṃs taṃ tatra eva dharmiṇy avasthāpayati
T11dhkhetuu:579: 02908 iti paraṃ bata bhāvānām asvāsthyam. anyatra
T11dhkhetuu:580: 02909 sādhya-dharmeṇa avinābhāvī hetur na dharmiṇy eva iti cet, tat
T11dhkhetuu:581: 02910 kim ayaṃ tapasvī ṣaṇḍham udvāhya putraṃ mṛgyate. yasya
T11dhkhetuu:582: 02911 dharmiṇy asaty api sādhya-dharme bhāvas tam upadarśya
T11dhkhetuu:583: 02912 kathaṃ sa dharmī sādhya-dharmavān ity ucyate. ata eva bādhā
T11dhkhetuu:584: 02913 bhāva uktaḥ; syād etat: yata eva hetur anyathā api bhavet, ata
T11dhkhetuu:585: 02914 eva pramāṇābhyām abādhita-dharmā dharmī ity ucyate iti tat 02915 kim idānīṃ hetoḥ sāmarthyam abādhayā eva sādhya-siddheḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:587: 02917 sādhya-siddhir iti vyartho hetuḥ; bādhāyām api, sādhana-sāmarthya
T11dhkhetuu:588: 02918 abhāvāt. aniyame na ca bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt sādhya-abhāvasya
T11dhkhetuu:589: 02919 ca sambhava iti na sāmarthyam abādhāyāḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:590: 02920 na bādhāyā abhāvo abādhā. kiṃ tarhi. bādhāyā anupalabdhiḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:591: 02921 sā ca puruṣasya kvacid bādha-asambhave api syād iti sa
T11dhkhetuu:592: 02922 hetu-prayogasya viṣayaḥ. kiṃ nu vai hetur bādha-upalabdher api
T11dhkhetuu:593: 02923 bibheti, na punar bādhāyāḥ, yena bādhām anādṛtya apy anupalabdhau 02924 prayoktavya iṣṭaḥ. sa tarhi hetuḥ paramārthena
T11dhkhetuu:594: 03001 bādhā kim asti na asti ity anapekṣya bādhā-anupalabdhau prayoktavyaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:595: 03002 kim arthaṃ prayujyate. sādhya-siddhy-artham. sa kiṃ 03003 kvacit satyām api bādhāyāṃ sādhyaṃ sādhayet, yena asyā abhāva
T11dhkhetuu:596: 03004 niścayaṃ prati yatno na kriyate hetuś ca prayujyate. tathā
T11dhkhetuu:597: 03005 ca abādhita-viṣayatvaṃ hetu-lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati, bādhāyām
T11dhkhetuu:598: 03006 api satyām asya sāmarthyāt; tathā ca anabhyupagamye saṃśayitasya
T11dhkhetuu:600: 03008 apy abhyupagamya prayujyate, tathā bādha-upalabdhāv api
T11dhkhetuu:602: 03010 na bādhāyāṃ satyāṃ sāmarthyam iti cet, yady evaṃ 03011 prayuktasya apy asāmarthya-prāptir ity anirṇīta-bādhā-sambhavaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:603: 03012 prayogaṃ na arhati. bādhā-anupalambhe sāmarthyam iti cet, kim
T11dhkhetuu:604: 03013 upalambho bādhāṃ vyāpnoti, yata evaṃ hetor bādhā-sambhava-
T11dhkhetuu:605: 03014 kṛtam asāmarthyaṃ na sambhavet. atha tan-nivṛttau bādhā
T11dhkhetuu:606: 03015 nivartate, tathā api bādhā-anupalambhād eva sādhya-siddher vyartho
T11dhkhetuu:607: 03016 hetuḥ, anupalambhe bādhāyā asambhavāt. upalambhasya nivṛttāv 03017 api bādhāyā anivṛttau tad-avasthaṃ hetor asāmarthyam 03018 ity aprayogaḥ. tasmāt sva-sādhya-bhāva-abhāvābhyām anyathā api 03019 bhavan hetur dharmiṇi kiṃcin na bhāvayati na vibhāvayati ity
T11dhkhetuu:608: 03020 upakṣepo na samarthaḥ. tan na bādhā-avinābhāvau sahāvasthitau;
T11dhkhetuu:611: 03023 vā bhavet, yasya bhāve api yasya anyasya abhāvaḥ. tad yathā 03024 pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe ca bhāva iti. na ca etad bādhāyā avinābhāve 03101 sati sambhavati iti na sādhya-viparyaya-avibhāvinor hetu-viruddhayor
T11dhkhetuu:612: 03102 viṣaye bādhā sambhavati iti na tad-abhāvaḥ pṛthag
T11dhkhetuu:613: 03103 anayor lakṣaṇa-antaratvena vācyaḥ. tasmād hetoḥ prayoge
T11dhkhetuu:614: 03104 pratijñāyā doṣāṇāṃ sambhavo na asti. na api kevalā pratijñā
T11dhkhetuu:616: 03106 etena eka-saṃkhyā-vivakṣā api pratyuktā. katham. eko hi sva-
T11dhkhetuu:617: 03107 sādhya-bhāva eva bhāvāt tad-avyabhicārī. tatra eva tasmād anyas
T11dhkhetuu:618: 03108 tad-bādhakasya eva bhāvāt tad-viruddha ity atra bādhayā
T11dhkhetuu:620: 03110 api ca kiṃ vastuto asambhavat-pratihetuḥ sa samyag-jñāna-
T11dhkhetuu:621: 03111 viparyaya-hetur āhosvid apradarśita-pratihetuḥ kiṃ ca ataḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:623: 03113 etat. hetv-abhāvo vā. na hy aniścita-ātmanaḥ pratipādaka-dharmasya
T11dhkhetuu:625: 03115 na api sandigdha-lakṣaṇo hetur bhavati iti na kaścid hetur
T11dhkhetuu:626: 03116 bhavet. tulya-lakṣaṇe hi dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyogi-sambhavo adṛṣṭa-
T11dhkhetuu:627: 03117 pratiyogiṣv api śaṅkām utpādayati, viśeṣa-abhāvāt; sati vā 03118 viśeṣe hetor lakṣaṇam; tato hi hetur ekāntena nirasta-pratipakṣaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:628: 03119 sva-sādhyaṃ niścāyayati ity atal-lakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt. tathā ca 03120 vyartha-eka-saṃkhyā-vivakṣā. ato viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo lakṣaṇaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:629: 03121 hīyeta svalakṣaṇa-yuktayor hetvor ekatra dharmiṇi virodhena upanipāte 03122 viruddhāvyabhicārī iti. na ca tasya viśeṣasya svarūpaṃ 03123 nirdiśyate, yat pratītya pratiyoginaḥ sambhava-asambhavāv
T11dhkhetuu:630: 03124 utpaśyāmaḥ. tasmān na asty eva viśeṣa iti sarvatra śaṅkayā 03201 bhavitavyam; dṛṣṭa-pratihetor api hetoḥ prāg itareṇa na kaścid
T11dhkhetuu:631: 03202 viśeṣo lakṣyate. na ca sambhavat-pratihetūnām api sarvadā 03203 tasya upalabdhiḥ; atiśayavatī tu prajñā-utprekṣiṇī dṛṣṭā. tena aniścayaḥ 03204 sambhava-asambhavayor iti lakṣaṇasya aniścitatvān na
T11dhkhetuu:633: 03206 atha apradarśita-pratihetuḥ, yathā āha: yadā tarhi śabdatvaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:634: 03207 nityam abhyupagacchati, tadā ayaṃ hetur eva syāt, yady atra anityatva
T11dhkhetuu:635: 03208 hetuṃ kṛtakatva-ādi kaścin na darśayed iti. idam aprakāśyam 03209 apy asaṃvaraṇīyam api iti kaṣṭhataraṃ vyasanam āyātaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:636: 03210 kathaṃ nirvoḍhuṃ śakyeta. sa tāvad ayaṃ hetur vastūni 03211 sva-sādhya-tattva-prakṛtīni kṛtvā tat-pramāṇakān puruṣān abhyudaya 03212 niḥśreyasābhyāṃ saṃyojayitvā punaḥ pratibhāvatā
T11dhkhetuu:638: 03214 vastūni tāṃś ca puruṣān tadbhāva-sampadaḥ pracyāvya-
T11dhkhetuu:639: 03215 bhraṣṭa-rājya iva rājā tapovanaṃ gacchati iti kiṃ atra brūmaḥ.
T11dhkhetuu:640: 03216 puruṣa-pratibhākṛtaṃ ca sādhanatvam. tat kiṃ vastutaḥ
T11dhkhetuu:641: 03217 sādhanam asādhanaṃ vā. sa ca hetuḥ svabhāvatas tad-dharma-bhāvī
T11dhkhetuu:642: 03218 yadi katham anyathā kriyeta, vastūnāṃ svabhāva-anyathābhāvasya
T11dhkhetuu:644: 03220 ca katham anyadā api sādhanaṃ kasyacit.
T11dhkhetuu:649: 03303 bhaviṣyati. kiṃ-rūpāl liṅgād artho jñātavya iti cintāyāṃ pratipattur
T11dhkhetuu:650: 03304 avisaṃvādakasya rūpam abhidhīyate, yasya darśanād 03305 ayaṃ sādhana-asādhane pravibhajya tasya iṣṭa-artha-saṃnidhāna
T11dhkhetuu:651: 03306 pratyayāt pravṛttim avalambate. tathā yad asya ātma-rūpaṃ tal
T11dhkhetuu:652: 03307 lakṣaṇam, na tu pararūpam. pratipatti-janmany upayoga-mātrāt
T11dhkhetuu:654: 03309 tal-lakṣaṇatvaṃ bhavet, na hi teṣv asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavati.
T11dhkhetuu:655: 03310 niścita-grahaṇaṃ tarhi na kartavyam. na na kartavyam,
T11dhkhetuu:658: 03312 hetum icchatāṃ na eva samartho hetur bhavati, sator api 03313 darśana-adarśanayor agamakatva-darśanāt. tena bhāva-abhāvābhyāṃ
T11dhkhetuu:659: 03314 gamaka iti jñāpana-arthaṃ niścita-grahaṇam. tena pararūpaṃ 03315 lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati, tena liṅgasya rūpa-viśeṣa-anabhidhānāt, tau
T11dhkhetuu:661: 03317 abhāvāt. tena, yady api bhāva-abhāva-vacana-mātreṇa tat-sādhana-
T11dhkhetuu:664: 03320 sattā-vyavasthāyās tayor eva sattā-prasiddher iti sarvatra 03401 sattā-vyavasthā eva tat-sādhanaṃ pramāṇam ākarṣati. parārthatvāc
T11dhkhetuu:666: 03403 arthasya iti tad rūpaṃ ye na vidanti, na teṣāṃ tataḥ pravṛttir iti 03404 para-upalakṣaṇatvād yady api jñānaṃ siddham, tathā api tāv eva
T11dhkhetuu:667: 03405 bhāva-abhāvau kecid darśana-adarśana-mātreṇa vyavasthāpayanti iti 03406 tan-niṣedha-artho niścita-śabda uktaḥ, sator api bhāva-abhāvayor
T11dhkhetuu:668: 03407 anvaya-vyatirekayoḥ sattāyāṃ saṃśayāt. tasmād yataḥ sattā-
T11dhkhetuu:669: 03408 prasādhaka-pramāṇād anayor niścayas tad-adhīnā iti jñāpana-artham
T11dhkhetuu:673: 03411 pṛthag ato jñānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati, tena eva arthasya avagatatvād
T11dhkhetuu:675: 03413 api tarhi na pṛthaktvam, ekasya prayogād ubhaya-gater
T11dhkhetuu:676: 03414 iti cet, na, hetoḥ sapakṣa-asapakṣayor bhāva-abhāvayor aparaspara-
T11dhkhetuu:677: 03415 ākṣepāt; ekaṃ vākyam ubhayaṃ gamayati ity ucyate,
T11dhkhetuu:678: 03416 na eko artho dvitīyasya. nanu tatra eva bhāvo tad-abhāve
T11dhkhetuu:679: 03417 ca abhāva iti vākye paraspara-ākṣepa iti cet, vacanam etad ekasya
T11dhkhetuu:681: 03419 ubhayam ākṣipati na punaḥ kevalau bhāva-abhāvāv ākṣipataḥ;
T11dhkhetuu:682: 03420 niyamavantau ca na kevalau, niyamasya ubhaya-rūpatvāt.
T11dhkhetuu:683: 03421 tasmāt tatra eva bhāva iti na bhāva eva ucyate, itareṇa api na
T11dhkhetuu:685: 03501 eva, yena bhāvo abhāvo vā dvitīyam ākṣipet. na evaṃ jñānaṃ
T11dhkhetuu:686: 03502 para-upalakṣaṇāt trailakṣaṇyād vyatirekitam iti na lakṣaṇa-antaram.
